name: Aidan Sawyer
overview: Over four years of web development experience, specializing in visual and technical frontend redesigns
State and National certifications and more than a year volunteering in Emergency Response
Strong background in managing multiple sites/platforms and creating a consistent UX between them
Interest and experience in web standards, web components, interoperability, and open source
BS in Software Engineering from Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT)
objective: Formally trained Software Engineer with growing experience and interest in Emergency Response..
